channel.title: flask on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in flask on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Building a simple website using Flask
item.description: Flask is a really fast and simple framework to use. It’s not packed with all sorts of features that you might not need at all, instead, they only give you the essentials. You are free to decide what to do for the rest.
